name: Marble Switch
description:
Move the turntable to prevent a terrible ball crash!

Tap to rotate the center track piece, and switch to a new track.
Each marble rock back and forth on its own line, keeping infinite momentum.
The MArble Switch challenge is to keep the marbles moving without crashing into each other.

You will need to anticipate the marbles movements to keep them in line, and make sure the center track piece (turntable) is always aligned with the correct rail.
Miss one, and everything blows up! Or at least one marble blows up. That’s still scary.

The difficulty ramps up as you keep going. It’s easy enough to manage two different tracks at once, but can you move your turntable fast enough to prevent three marbles from colliding? What about four?

Switch track, but don’t lose your marbles!
